ModMetaData.author: Porohkun
ModMetaData.name: Concrete Only
ModMetaData.description:
This is fork of my ConcreteWalls mod (http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=795240891) but without walls and stuff. Only concrete.
/!\ ATTENTION /!\ version 1.1 is the last for this mod. Use ConcreteWalls mod instead - it have now option for disable embrasures in mod settings, and dont have additional walls and doors type.
